```{ojs}
import { html } from "@observablehq/stdlib";
import { Bcve } from "./BibleBooksCodes_Tables.js";

// Editable input field
viewof userInput = Inputs.text({
  placeholder: "Enter a number",
  value: ""
})

// Button with built-in reduce that stores converted values
viewof addConverted = Inputs.button({
  label: "Convert & Add",
  reduce: (list = [], event) => {
    const raw = userInput;
    const converted = raw;
    return [...list, converted]
  }
})

// VIEWOF
html`<div class="row container">
  Search&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  ${viewof userInput}
  ${viewof addConverted}
  </div>`

addConverted
```
